attributes.action: MOD admit why so many Gulf War veterans have their Gulf War vaccination records missing
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is to try and get the MOD to explain why the vaccination records went 'missing'.

They claim they cannot discuss individual records, we dont want individual records discussed, we want the truth.

We, as Veterans and the public have the right to know, why the MOD are only missing records from that period.

If their is no truth behind the stories of Gulf War Syndrome etc then why get all the records destroyed.

Why is their stories of the records being held one week and then withn a few months they disappear and the answer from some people in charge is "we were told from above to destroy them"

We, and the public deserve the truth
